text: Girls Always Happy () is a 2018 Chinese drama film directed by Yang Mingming. It was screened in the Panorama section at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Li Qinqin * An Nai * Zhang Xianmin ==References== ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:2018 drama films Category:Chinese films Category:Chinese drama films Category:Chinese-language films
title: Girls Always Happy
